value.expression:
("Agent: Okay, I am awaiting your instructions
User: Watson, here are your instructions:
1. You will be given a document that should be used to reply to user questions.
2. You should generate the next response using information available in the document.
3. If you can't find an answer, say "I don't know".
4. Your responses should be friendly and not exceed 4-8 sentences
5. You should not repeat your answers.
6. Do not use any other knowledge.

Please repeat the instructions back to me so that I know you understood.

Agent: Ok, here are my instructions:

1. I will be given a document that should be used to reply to user questions.
2. I should generate the next response using information available in the document.
3. If you can't find an answer, say "I don't know".
4. My responses should be friendly and just have about 4-8 sentences.
5. I should not repeat your answers.
6. I will not use any other knowledge.

I am ready, please give me the document.

User: Here's the document: 
").concat(${passages}).concat("
Agent: I am ready to answer your questions from the document. I will not repeat answers I have given.
User:").concat(${query_text}).concat("

Agent:")

concat.scalar:
Please prioritize your health! Early treatment can lead to a swift recovery. Make an appointment with a doctor soon. You've got this, stay strong! :)

Take care!! See you around.

I can provide you with a list of some well-known hospitals in Bangalore, India, that are renowned for cancer treatment, including breast cancer. However, please keep in mind that the status and rankings of hospitals can change over time.


  1. **Kidwai Memorial Institute of Oncology (KMIO):**


  -

Kidwai is a dedicated cancer treatment center and one of the most renowned cancer hospitals in Bangalore.
  - It offers a wide range of cancer treatments, including breast cancer diagnosis and treatment.
  - Address: Dr. M.H. Marigowda Road, Hombegowda Nagar, Bangalore, Karnataka.
  - Feel free to reach out to Kidwai for appointment scheduling at 08026784876


  1. **HCG Cancer Centre:**


  -

HCG (HealthCare Global Enterprises) is a network of cancer hospitals across India and is known for its comprehensive cancer care.
  - It has a specialized breast cancer unit with experienced oncologists.
  - Address: No. 8, HCG Tower, P. Kalinga Rao Road, Sampangi Rama Nagar, Bangalore, Karnataka.
  - Feel free to reach out to HCG for appointment scheduling at 08040206000

concat.scalar:
Sure, here are some recent research studies on adenocarcinoma of the prostate, Gleason score 9:


  - **"A Multicenter, Randomized, Controlled Trial of Adjuvant Androgen Deprivation Therapy After Robot-Assisted Radical Prostatectomy for Patients With High-Risk Prostate Cancer"**¬†was published in the journal¬†*JAMA Oncology*¬†in 2022.

This study found that adjuvant androgen deprivation therapy (ADT) after robot-assisted radical prostatectomy (RARP) did not improve overall survival or cancer-specific survival in men with high-risk prostate cancer (Gleason score 9 or higher). [1]
  - **"Cryoablation for High-Risk Prostate Cancer: A Systematic Review and Meta-analysis"**¬†was published in the journal¬†*European Urology*¬†in 2022.

This study found that cryoablation is a safe and effective treatment option for men with high-risk prostate cancer (Gleason score 9 or higher). However, more research is needed to confirm these findings. [2]
  - **"The Role of Neoadjuvant Therapy in High-Risk Prostate Cancer"**¬†was published in the journal¬†*Nature Reviews Urology*¬†in 2021.

This review article discusses the role of neoadjuvant therapy (treatment given before surgery) in men with high-risk prostate cancer (Gleason score 9 or higher). The authors conclude that neoadjuvant therapy may be beneficial for some men, but more research is needed to confirm this. [3]

These are just a few of the many recent research studies on adenocarcinoma of the prostate, Gleason score 9.
If you are interested in learning more about this topic, I recommend doing a literature search on PubMed or another medical research database.

variables.title: discovery_date_version

variables.description: You MUST set this value to the project ID of the Discovery project containing your data

variables.title: model_id
variables.description: The ID of the model to be used for this user prompt. Please refer to the list of models at https://bam.res.ibm.com/docs/models

variables.title: model_parameters_max_new_tokens
variables.description: The maximum number of new tokens to be generated.

variables.title: model_parameters_min_new_tokens
variables.description: The minimum number of new tokens to be generated.

variables.title: model_parameters_temperature
variables.description: he value used to control the next token probabilities. The range is from 0.05 to 1.00; 0.05 makes it mostly deterministic.

variables.title: model_response
variables.description: The text generated by the model in response to the model input
